constraints.name: subset_constraint
constraints.description: 每个承包商只能粉刷其喜欢的颜色集合中的颜色
constraints.formal: ∀ j, C[y + l] ∈ B[j] for l = 0 to M-1

constraints.name: cyclic_assignment
constraints.description: 承包商的分配是循环的，即第 ((x + l) % M) 个承包商粉刷第 (y + l) 段墙壁
constraints.formal: ∀ l, contractor = (x + l) % M, wall_segment = y + l

constraints.name: validity_check
constraints.description: 如果存在一个 l 使得第 ((x + l) % M) 个承包商不喜欢第 C[y + l] 种颜色，则该要求无效
constraints.formal: ∃ l, C[y + l] ∉ B[(x + l) % M] → requirement is invalid

constraints.name: min_requirements
constraints.description: 需要找到最小的要求次数，使得每段墙壁都能用预期的颜色粉刷
constraints.formal: minimize |{requirements}| such that ∀ i, C[i] is painted by a valid contractor
